You may cast this spell from your graveyard as long as you've discarded a card this turn.
{1}{R}{G}, Discard this card: Destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment. Draw a card.

This spell can't be countered.
This spell deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker you don't control. If that permanent would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature or land you control
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +2/+1 and has haste.
Whenever you tap enchanted permanent for mana, add one mana of any color.

Double strike
Your opponents can't gain life.
Whenever an opponent loses 1 or more life, this creature rages. [i](You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]

Whenever you discard one or more cards, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature.
Discard a card: This creature gains your choice of first strike, menace, trample or haste until end of turn.

Trample [i](This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)[/i]
Haste [i](This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)[/i]

First strike, trample
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
As long as this creature has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it has double strike.

When this creature enters, distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures you control.
Creatures you control with a +1/+1 counter on them have deathtouch.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you draw a card.

Haste [i](This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)[/i]
{2}{G}: This creature rages. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]

Trample
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

Flying
When this creature enters, each player draws a card and gains 1 life.

[i]“Aren't thrulls the powerful's best companion? So eager to please, to beg for subjugation.”
—Orzhov Pontiff[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance, lifelink
Once each turn, whenever you lose life, you may pay {2}. If you do, you draw a card.

cards.flavor_text: [i]“The deal's simple: grab and give me what you owe us or the blade will take its payment.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When this creature enters, target player reveals X cards from their hand, where X is the total amount of life players lost this turn. You choose one of those cards. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Next time, be careful what you label as priceless.”[/i]

Menace [i](This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)[/i]

[i]Oblation 3[/i] – When this enchantment enters, you may pay 3 life. If you do, each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
Whenever a creature or planeswalker an opponent controls dies, create a Treasure token and you gain 1 life.

The first spell your opponents cast each turn costs an additional 2 life to cast.
At the beginning of each end step, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying and a Treasure token if a player paid life that turn.
Lifelink [i](Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)[/i]

Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink
Ward–Pay 4 life.
[i][i]Oblation 6[/i][/i] – When this creature enters, you may pay 6 life. If you do, destroy each other nonland permanent.

Vigilance
[i][i]Oblation X[/i][/i] – When this creature enters, you may pay X life. If you do, return any number of target creature, enchantment and/or planeswalker cards with total mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on them.

Flash
If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card unless they pay 2 life. If they do, you gain 2 life.
[i][i]Oblation 3[/i][/i] – When this creature enters, you may pay 3 life. If you do, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Defender [i](This creature can't attack.)[/i]
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

Flash

Choose one or both–
• Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. You gain 1 life for each creature cards exiled this way.
• Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Flourish 2.
[-3]: Exile target artifact, creature or enchantment. Its owner gains life equal to that permanent's mana value.
[-5]: For each token you control, create a token that's a copy of it. Then flourish X, where X is the number of creatures you control.

cards.rules_text: Exile all nontoken creatures. Flourish X, where X is the number of creatures exiled this way. [i](Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens or distribute X +1/+1 counters among creatures you control.)[/i]

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each counters among creatures you control.

This spell can't be countered or copied.
Copy target instant or sorcery spell or activated or triggered ability X times. You may choose new targets for the copies. The copies can't be countered.

At the beginning of your first main phase, choose one –
• When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. You may only cast one spell this turn.
• Draw a card, then discard a card. Add {C}{U}{R}. This mana can't be spent to cast permanent spells.

• Target player mills three cards.

• Draw a card.
